thread.title: Tiger Shroff Will Appear On Koffee With Karan Along With Jackie Shroff
thread.title_full: Tiger Shroff Will Appear On Koffee With Karan Along With Jackie Shroff

title: Tiger Shroff Will Appear On Koffee With Karan Along With Jackie Shroff
text:
facebook 183 SHARES 
We have to agree, Koffee With Karan has become a must-watch this season. We are sure you all want to know the next person who will take the couch, after Priyanka Chopra's interesting episode. Well, Karan Johar will now host the father-son duo, Tiger and Jackie Shroff. 
As we all know, celebrities say things on that couch that they have never said before. Jackie and Tiger Shroff were no exception. Tiiger confesses that he has had a crush on Shraddha Kapoor, while Jackie expresses his fascination for Madhuri Dixit. Check out the promo here.
